entry.title: In Texas, Key Opposition to School Vouchers Is Rural and Red
entry.content: Republican Gov. Greg Abbott has called for another special legislative session after a school-choice bill failed to passâ€”again.

entry.title: Israeli Forces Advance Toward Heart of Gaza City as Humanitarian Crisis Deepens
entry.content: Israeli troops were advancing toward the heart of Gaza City, engaging in heavy gunbattles and ratcheting up pressure on neighborhoods that have become a refuge for tens of thousands of Palestinians.
